meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to a crime.
meanings.sent1: The parking violation was a noncriminal offense.
meanings.sent2: She had a noncriminal record, with no history of lawbreaking.
meanings.sent3: The noncriminal act of jaywalking made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as noncriminal as a clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The noncriminal behavior of the puppy was endearing.

meanings.definition: A person who is not involved in criminal activities.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood watch ensured that all residents were noncriminals.
meanings.sent2: He was proud to be known as a noncriminal in the community.
meanings.sent3: The noncriminal always brought positivity to the group.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like a noncriminal in a den of thieves.
meanings.sent5: Being a noncriminal meant he could sleep peacefully at night.
